channel.title: 317 VPS Problem
channel.description:
I just got my new CentOS (Linux) VPS and i got it to run and everything, but when i connect, i log in and it sits a black screen for about 10-15 seconds, then it just disconnects me.
I need help guys :)

item.title: 317 VPS Problem
item.dc:creator: @Nice_Boots Nice Boots
item.description:
@Nice_Boots wrote:

We purchased it from RackFlux, and the specs are:

1 vCPU
750MB of RAM
25GB Storage
300GB of Bandwidth

It lets us host it but when we login it just disconnects us. Its almost like its a mysql problem and it cant save that char files. just a guess

Read full topic

item.title: 317 VPS Problem
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

DerpaDerpy:

Idk thats never happened to me before

I have a feeling you just wanted +1 post count from this.

On topic, this is an odd problem, seeing as it’s Unix, have you installed all of the packages correctly? You may want to look into tutorials on running java applications from a Unix OS. Also, what are the specs of the VPS and who did you purchase is from? I know a bit about networking and I’ll try my best to help.

Read full topic
